entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming south 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
